This screems that the resort needs to be updated. If you are not from the area, you NEED internet access to find your way around. They offer an internet cafe which closes at 5PM (what's the point?) and also a terminal in the lobby. If you need to print something, cross your fingers that the printer is working. Front Desk Staff: Outstanding. They addressed all of our issues immediately. I almost feel bad for them, because I know the short comings of this resort is not their fault, but they take the brunt of the complaints. On our last day in Florida, we had found a property during the day that we liked and put a bid in. Since we were leaving very early inb the morning, we needed to get contracts signed and faxed out. As luck would have it, the printer in the lobby was not working. The girl at the front desk (I think her name was Anelia) was able to print out our documents from her office printer. We then asked her to fax the signed documents for us. Again, as luck would have it, our real estate agent's fax machine was not working. We finally found another solution, but we were almost 30 minutes past Anelia's quitting time. She stuck with us and we were able to eventually get the documents faxed, and we are now one step closer to moving down to Florida. Thanks again to the staff. Conclusion: It appears that there may not be enough owners in this property to finance a "make over" It's too bad, because the "bones" of the resort are good, but it appears that they are 20 years out dated, and ore using the bandaid method to stay afloat. I wish them the best, but I cannot reccommed this resort. I can look past a lot of things, but even I had a hard time doing that. If I had to call the desk for every issue, I would have been on the phone every day.

Reviews.Title: “Don't believe what you hear.”
Reviews.Author: Jenn612
Reviews.Content: After reading all the negative reviews I almost changed my reservation but I could not find another place that had a full kitchen for the week I needed it. I arrived at the Plantation on Sunday 6/5 and THANK GOD I did not switch. When we arrived we were greated by a very nice front desk clerk that checked us in. She told us the room would not be ready until 4pm, but we could enjoy the resort. We went to layout by the pool and had a awsome day. We got hotdogs for $1.00 (every sunday) and also had sundae's for $2.00 starting at 3pm. At around 4 we checked into the room which was located near the basketball court (very quite). Our unit was clean, we had towels but no washcloths. I went to the front desk and got them right away without any problems. The kitchen appliances all worked to include the washer and dryer. I would agree that there could have been more utensils in the kitchen (ex. a strainer for mac and cheese, cookie sheets for baking). I do not believe that there is enough to cook a full meal but I was on vacation and was not looking to do that anyway. My hubby and I ate dinner out every evening anyway. We had a 1-bedroom, 2 story unit and it was AWSOME!!!! The pools were outstanding, the hot tub only had a few jets working but it wasn't the end of the world. I have been to Florida approx. 10 times and usual stay in the seaworld area but wanted to try something a little different. Oak Plantation is not a 4 star property but for a vacation involving parks that will ware you out this place is perfect. It's wonderful to get back to in the evening and sit out by the pool that is open until 1am. This place is excellent for family's esp. with small children. If you are a person who is looking for the Hilton at Oak Plantation prices this may not be the place for you. I am an easy going person that wants a decent place to stay. Not looking for the "BEST" but not the "WORSE". Oak was perfect and I will be going back without a doubt! Thank you Oak Plantation for a great vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Wost place i have ever stayed!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jc1101
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for the last 3 nights of our disney vacation. I have stayed at all sorts of budget hotels and nowhere near the dump this condo was. The receptionist in the office was very rude and didn't seem to want to check us in. Then when we got in the room there was blood on the sheets, dirty bathroom towels, baby moths nest, dead cockroaches behind the couch, fingernails on the floor just for starters. It was the dirtiest room i have ever been in. As i was laying on the bed i noticed a huge bug crawling on me. I brushed it off and then i found two little flea like bugs on my arms that i killed. I believe they were bed bugs. It was the worst bed i have ever slept in and i couldn't sleep the whole night because i felt like bugs were crawling on me. It was disgusting. The next day we told them we wanted to change rooms because ours had BUGS in it. They didn't seem to even care and said they are full and not sure if they can move us. I demanded and they gave us another room. This room was better and cleaner but i never could get the first room out of my mind. Not that the new one was great..it had left over ice cream in the freezer and still no clean towels, but at least the beds were bug free it seemed. I still can't believe how horrible this condo is..it looked so nice on the websites. Don't believe any good reviews on this condo...they are all LIES.....i have never wrote a review on a hotel before..but this condo should be condemned. Hopefully this review will help save someone money on this dump and stay somewhere bug free and nicer. Oh and they take a $50 deposit when you check to make sure the room was the same as you got it....what a joke. I was going to dump a dozen cockroaches in there and say its just how i found it when i got it. This place was the worst !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Bed bugs...which they told me were ants...?”
Reviews.Author: navyduck
Reviews.Content: So we noticed bed bugs around filed a complant and they moved our room to nother yet again we found bed bugs, a very dirty carpet, lights not working in the room, a whole in the fridge and blood stained sheets[same as first room]. Filed a complaint they ended up cleaning another room for us but we left anyways for another local resort. On top of this when I was checking out they reassigned the room to another guest. This being justified on them seeing "sweet ants" and no adult bed bugs or roaches...keep in mind this is management inspecting during the day... positive note desk staff are helpful

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, and all there to help you.”
Reviews.Author: Karen48_11
Reviews.Content: The grounds are beautiful. It's the perfect location. Wonderful area for families, but my opinion is that they need more staff and some more recent upkeep on the Efficiency units. The efficiency units needed some update renovations like replacing the carpet, newer appliances, etc.

Reviews.Title: “What a Great Place for an enjoyable vacation..Meomories will live on and you will want to return.”
Reviews.Author: binshanbermudez
Reviews.Content: Oak Plantation Resort is a great place for the most enjoyable vacation anyone is hoping for. My husband, two children and my self were there for Easter. We had the most enjoyable vacation. it was better than any other resorts we stayed before. Great place, beautiful. Lots of activities by the pool for the children..art, sand art, hot dog cook out, icream sundaes, tie dye t/shirts and most of all dive-in move at the pool.. It was great to have a bar by the pool.. Very spacious and well maintained.. Everyting was close by and many shopping areas also. Very friendly staff esp. Joann the activity coordinator. We hardly gooutside of the plantation because we felt very comfortable and my childred looked forward for Joann to do someting diffrent every day. So nice we had even made dinner and breakfast in the unit. I recommend this place to anyone who is looking forward for a beautiiful, vacation full with memories.. Its a beautiful dream come through. We will be back..........Felix, Bibi, Azeem & Amina

Reviews.Title: “DONT WASTE YOUR $ OR TIME WITH THIS RESORT”
Reviews.Author: gonzo12345
Reviews.Content: First i will start by saying i am NOT the one to ever write reviews on Hotels, Resorts, Cruises etc. However, we have been on a number of vacations and let me tell you this was THEE worst resort i have EVER seen. We are not High Maintenance by no means or hard to please but i need to spread the word of how redic this place is. Myself and my husband along with our parents and siblings decided to stay here for 1 week after we did a 7 day cruise. I will put in jot note form of all the horiable things we experience in our 2 day stay. *We left the resort after we seen the COCKROACHES*. -No towels in the room -Floors and bathroom, filty -No Kitchen accesories:Pots/Pans/Baking Sheets etc (These are suppose to be Suites) -Washer/Dryer had a bunch or things behind it sticking out such as kitchen utensils, it honestly look like there was a domestic volent outburst. -Pull Out Couch had a tone of things in it when we pulled it out for our cousin to sleep in such as chip bags, juice boxes. -The Peacocks are very loud usually start making lots of noise at about 6am -Air Conditioning: you need airplugs its that loud -Our suite AND my inlaws had COCKROACHES in Both units. I was laying back on the couch one evening and all of a sudden I heard a tick tick noise and look down and saw a HUGE cockroach on the floor! We packed our bags and were gone in about 20 mins, left to fine another hotel in Orlando @ midnight. -Flies galore up by the hot tub at night. You feel like you are camping in the woods not on a sunny resort. -OK So heres the lowdown on the managment at this resort. We called down to the front desk on day 1 when we arrived and told them that we were not please with the rooms conditions. There response was well thats all we can do call EXPEDIA where you booked your stay. We were shocked and responded to them "Expedia cant clean our rm...lol That being said they offered us a VIP cleaning. We went to Universal the next day and gave them the benefit of the doubt that the rm will be much better when we returned the next day. However the only visable change was now there were towels on the racks oh and by the way they told us we were responable to wash them??? That same night is when we also saw the cockroach and said this is it....were out. **The hole experience was a disaster and please take my word and dont waste your $$ on this dive.** Hope this helps :0)

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Townie1952
Reviews.Content: All in all it was just as the pictures showed, but the units were old. We also stayed at a hotel on our way home that was much more expensive & just as dated. Could do with new carpet, the dishwasher looked dangerously old- had burn marks in it- so we used the sink., the fridge needed replacement, no kettle, good thing we didn't have to pay for the washe/rdryer use- it took all night to dry clothes, very erratic housekeeping regarding towels & sheets, most of the windows wouldn't open, but on the plus side we were close to everything, the pool was heated & the atmosphere there was nice. I don't know how old it is but it could do with some new owners/cash.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again”
Reviews.Author: basti1
Reviews.Content: Was our second stay there. Loved the peacocks,the lake, the pool area -could use it until 1 am.Our room was spacious, did sleep well in the beds.AC was a bit loud,so we switched it off during the night. Breakfast was not a hit... The gym a joke... But the rest was awesome...Will definately stay again...

Reviews.Title: “Need improving”
Reviews.Author: weirdi
Reviews.Content: the rooms and bathroom could do with a good cleaning. We paid for maid service and our towels where removed and nothing was replaced. Window ceills where full of dust and bugs, rug had speed bumbs and a lot of dirty spots, the king bed, sheets didn't fit, they turned the queen sheets around to look like they fit, no tea towels and no dish rags, toaster didn't work and when ask to replace it the one we got was no better, three TV's and one remote, safe didn't work and when we asked about this they said that the company had gone out of buisness and I guess they didn't bother trying to get some one else to repair them. verey like will not stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Awful and Disgusting!!”
Reviews.Author: NewfieGirl71
Reviews.Content: Do not be fooled by the pictures. We booked this resort through Hotwire and fortunately were able to check out and go to another resort. We travelled with 2 other familiies both which have young children. The rooms are dirty! There were big stains on the carpet, the bathrooms were still dirty from the last visitors. The appliances did not work. The dryer took about 3 hours to dry a couple of items. There were silverfish bugs in the bathroom, our friends had bedbugs and the other group of friends had little bugs in their kitchen. There are stray cats roaming the property. It is impossible to get towels. We had to hide the towels we had. I went to the Wal-Mart and picked up cleaning supplies b/c I was tired arguing with these people to clean our accommodations. We checked out after 2 days. It was horrible!!! The people posting positive reviews obviously do not care about cleanliness.

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: BEDBUGLADY
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Oak Plantation Resort from April 9/11 to April 16/11. I booked the trip through Expedia and this resort was on their list of exceptable hotels so even though there rating was only 2 1/2 stars I figured we would save alittle by not having all the amenities and spend more on activities. After the first night in the morning, there was small blood stain smears on the bed sheet. Not knowing anything about bed bugs we ignored the first sign. Night after night more and more blood smears appeared on the bed sheets and itchy bites around my ankles appeared which at the time I thought was mosquito bites. After arriving back in Canada hundreds yes hundreds of bites appeared all over my body. Went to doctor and he suspected bed bugs. The next day hundreds of bites appeared over my partners body and we went to emergency and was diagnosed with bed bugs. I have been off work all week washing, disinfecting the house and all our clothing and lying in a bath trying to relieve the itching. So isn't that a nice way to end your vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation”
Reviews.Author: kbwesler
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews before coming and we were hesitent to stay at oak plantation but we were pleasently surprised. We stayed in building 10 which was updated and looks to be newly renovated. However blg 10 is the most remote on the property and it backs up to a forrest like setting, so its nice and secluded and quiet. Buildings 1,4, 15 and 14 are right on the pool, but im not sure what the inside looks like, but i assume they have not been renovated. The pool, hottub and outdoor tiki bar are great, clean. There are $1 hotdog and $2 ice cream sundaes daily at the pool which is fun. The tennis courts, basketball and activities center are well kept. Next to blg 2 is the breakfast which is only $3 for kids buffet style and $6 for adults. I was impressed with the property as a whole and the service except for the old guy bartender at the tiki bar. he is an jerk. He should be fired as he taints the overall perception of the facility. There are some not well maintaned aspects of the complex that can be easily fixed, which show an overall degredation of the facility No internet except in the pool and internet cafe, but i tethered my bb and got internet no problem, so its wasnt an issue for me Other posts say its close to disney and other locations, i felt it was too far. 22 min to disney park entrance and its past mile marker 15 on sr192. However there are a lot of gokart, medevil times, shopping, etc close by, but many have gfone out of business with many emtpy store fronts. Downtown Kissimmee is only 3 miles away and i would suggest renting a boat on lakeshore blvd at the kissimmee boat rentals (www.kissimmeeboatrentals.com/toho.html ). For 2 hrs it was only $100 and there were a bunch of islands to explore. I would skip any fan boats and rather rent a boat to explore the lakes. Other posts said the planes that fly over from kissimmee airport were an issue, but the noise was not bad since they were small jets. We thought it was neat to show the kids the airplanes landing and taking off. This is definately a kids friendly place and some of the older couples you could tell had an issue with all the kids. The complex is well protected via gate and we felt very safe the whole time. The peacocks everywhere are fun and very beautiful. Definately very unique to see peacocks walking all over the place with their beautiful feathers. The workout center is garbage. i wouldnt even call it a fitness center as it has one machine, 2 treadmills, one that was broken. it was extremely hot and small. All in all we would recommend this place. But if we were to do disney in the future, we would stay on a disney property for ease of accessiblity and naps for the kids.

Reviews.Title: “If you believe in cleanliness DON'T stay at this resort”
Reviews.Author: ajohnson84
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this resort during our visit to Disney World. I had read the reviews and really wish I would have listened. I will never visit here again and I am currently trying to get a reimbursement from my travel company. The furniture and carpets were very filthy. The beds were very hard and the pillows must have been made out of cotton balls. The sleep quality was horrible and if we hadn't been so tired from Disney we wouldn't have been able to sleep the little bit that we did. The pool was always dirty and the hot tub had scum and inch thick that you could rub off, I didn’t visit the pool area again after I wiped my hand on the side of the hot tub. It was very disgusting. The towels are very very hard; they must not use fabric softener at all. The soap they give you is like hotel soap, and a tiny shampoo/conditioner also. If you do stay here you will definitely have to make a trip to Wal-Mart. You won’t have enough wash clothes ever, so we bought more of those also. You are not given any complimentary laundry soap and the dryer doesn’t work worth a damn. I had to dry my clothes for 3 hours to get them dry. The laundry room was filthy beside and behind the washer/dryer. The corners were all full of junk; they don’t take time to clean these rooms well enough at all. The furniture in the living room is so nasty I had to cover it with sheets to sit on it. The sheets don’t fit the beds well. The water has no pressure and it stinks like sewer water too. Overall this place made me feel very nasty. If you value personal hygiene at all DON’T stay at this resort. Also, there is no free Wi-Fi in your room either and that was a big drawback when you have things that you have to take care of while away from home. Sorry I don't know how to upload my photos from my cell phone but I was able to take several disgusting pictures.

Reviews.Title: “Don't be fooled by the pictures!!”
Reviews.Author: hensley084
Reviews.Content: This resort looks and sounds beautiful by looking and reading the website, dont be fooled by that. and let the reviews of others turn you away. If you are looking for a dirty, not well maintained, a not so pleasant staff, and a place that is in need of a major face lift this is the place for you. We are members of interval international and we have stayed at many resorts in the Kissimmee area, so after driving for over 24 hours in a car with young children and teenagers we were ready to settle in for the week and begin our family vacation. After pulling in to this place I thought I was having a terrible dream, but that was not the case. I went to check in and was asked for my credit card to hold a $50 deposit in case anything was not put in the condition it was found, I wanted to see the place I would be staying before I even thought about giving them my credit card. I took the key to the room so I could look around, the room was dirty, the carpet didn't look like it had ever been clean, and if you planned on cooking you might want to bring your own pots and pans because they sure don't have it there! Not to mention the awful smell :0 We went and looked at the pool which looks amazing in the pictures, (Not So Much) only to see the bottom of the pool covered with dirt, and the pool surroundings coverd in leaves (ever heard of a broom)! Needless to say we didn't end up staying here, and the staff was less then thrilled about us not wanting to stay at this "dive" they acted like this was a 5 star resort and everyone should want to stay here, I can assure you that is not the case, and we were not the only ones who were checking out before checking in!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: CNBUK
Reviews.Content: Booked through Virgin Holidays. Arrived to a luke-warm welcome from overworked and under-enthused staff. $50 security deposit on card to be refunded 12hrs after check-out (no mention of that by Virgin). Our appartment was in block 6, number 602, clean and tidy with lots of room. The air-con unit was noisy, but could live with that. Kitchen was in need of new appliances, but everything worked and was clean! Bathroom was clean and functioning, but could do with a refurb. Bedroom was clean and tidy, bed wasnt the best ive slept in, but was ok. Televisions were old tube style and there was a VHS player in the lounge. Was ok as we didnt go 4000 miles to watch TV. Would definately stay there again as itS worth the money, well located and clean, tidy and presentable. Internet cafe on site 9-5 for keeping in touch, as well as a pool and tennis courts and some things for kids. A big site with lots of units in a great setting. Cleaners in everyday for no extra charge. Had breakfast once, very poor quality. Polystyrene plates and cups, low quality food, with little range, all self service including rubbish disposal. HOWEVER a self catering resort with wallmart over the road so not bothered too much. We had a few ants one evening so we called the front desk and within 15min a chap came with some spray. No ants to be seen again. The biggest issues were the lack of enthusiasm from the staff. They did there job, but always seemed to be moaning about the lack of this or that in front of guests. The other issue was the poor quality breakfast. Would stay again, were out all day, so only there to sleep and have breakfast. Pleased with choice we made.

Reviews.Title: “In a word - "dirty", but has potential with major overhaul...”
Reviews.Author: blktalon
Reviews.Content: This place needs a good cleaning and some major repairs and replacement of equipment. I would have to place it as one of the worst resorts i have been to. There were leaves everywhere, especially in the pool area. Holes in the siding of the condos. Equipment and room supples like towels were missing and not delivered in a timely manner. The furnace filter was so disgusting i didnt even want to touch it. The workers here definaly should get a reality check if they want to work at this resort, from there blank mundain expressions and attention to detail, i know some people that would love to replace them.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful but needs good cleaning and updating”
Reviews.Author: MoeMary1400
Reviews.Content: This is one of the prettiest resorts we have stayed at. It is just off the 192 so convenient to restaurants, etc. It has lots of trees, peacocks, a pretty pond with waterfountains, fish, turtles and ducks, a lovely pool area with 2 pools a large hot tub and a tiki bar. It is very easy to just relax and do nothing. The staff we dealt with were always friendly and helpful. We were there for almost 2 months and with one exception loved it. The problem was always with the cleaning. Even though they were always polite and sympathetic when I complained about the quality of the cleaning, it takes away some of your pleasure to have to complain. They badly need to remove the old filthy carpets and put in something like tile that is easily maintained. Especially as they don't use the vacuums very often. My feelings about this resort are very mixed. I loved the people, the grounds, even the unit we were in but we won't go back.

Reviews.Title: “Never, Never stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: diemax6
Reviews.Content: We are here right now today is March 21, 2011. We arrived and our room was 83 F, AC did not work, we call them down serval times and then I had to tell them I had troble breathing because it was so hot, they final came down to fix it. Then my husband took a shower in the master bedroom and the tub was 1/2 full of water and it won't drain..... I woke up this morning and it is still full of water. I call them serval times and they still have NOT come. The rooms are very out dated, however that I could deal with as we are only here a week. The pools are cloudy and leaves everywhere deck and pool. Kids are in the hot tub running around threwing food and they are not doning anything about this. The parents of those children are just sitting talking and watching them. BAD, BAD.....no internet in rooms, you have to go to the pool, or cafe. When we arrived early to see what the rooms looked like they showed us a beautiful room, but what they gave us after we checked it was aweful. We prepaid, so we couldn't get our money back. Force to stay or lose alot. We are making the best of it, but I would like everyone out there to know, especially if you have kids, Don't come here..........

Reviews.Title: “Not as Bad as Others have Said”
Reviews.Author: a2a3dseddie
Reviews.Content: We stayed in building #2 room 202 during this years' March Break. I was pretty worried after reading all of the negative reports, but all in all this place is not the hell hole others would have you believe. First of all, if you can request it, ask for building #2. It is the closest building to the Main lobby, the exit, the breakfast building and is very close to the pool area. I'll try to address some of the complaints others have written about. Cockroaches and ants. I didn't see any roaches but did see 1 ant the whole week we were there. It didn't put up much of a struggle. Tube TVs: Yes, there weren't any 40 inch HD flat screen LCD or Plasma TVs here. For those of you who hate watching Oprah or Jerry Springer on anything less, you might need to look elsewhere for accomodations. For those of you who only need the weather channel in order to plan your day they are fine. Cleanliness: I can only speak about our unit, and it was fine. The kitchen floor and living room carpet weren't clean enough to eat off of, but I can't do that at home either. It would have been nice to have had a vacuum cleaner in the unit, but it is what it is. Less work for me, more work for the cleaning staff when I check out. Outdated or rusted appliances: Our washer and dryer seemed fairly new, and I didn't notice any glaring rust on the refrigerator or dish washer. I was just trying to remember if there was any rust on the stove or washing machine in my room at the 5 star Bellagio Hotel in Las Vegas or the Venetian Resort in Las Vegas...oh wait, those rooms didn't have any appliances in them at all. All the appliances worked just fine. Lack of towels or other items: Nope, our family of 4 had enough of everything. We washed all our towels halfway through our trip. No big deal. Poor breakfast buffet: I booked through Expedia and the package included a free breakfast buffet for 2 people the entire 7 days we were there. If you're the type of person to complain about FREE food, stop reading right now. Yes the selection did not change for the whole week, but who cares? Scrambled eggs, sausages, breakfast potatoes, bagels, cream cheese, toast, cinnamon buns, oatmeal, cold cereals, a waffle maker with whipped cream and fruit, coffee, tea, fruit juices and milk were available every day. Who eats better than that for breakfast every day? The staff in charge of the room didn't even mind if you snuck out a cup of coffee or some food. The area is unsafe: Really? It's a gated area accessed by your room key and there is security patroling the grounds around the clock. I didn't see anything that would suggest the area is dangerous. Noisy: The only noise I heard were the peacocks in the mornings. I was afraid we were making too much noise with our nightly Yahtzee game. Something that surprised me were all of the activities they had planned at the resort. We didn't partake in any of them since we spent each day out at the parks, but I thought it was a nice touch. Maybe I just got lucky and got a nice unit, but let's get real. You didn't pay for the Ritz Carlton, so why expect it? Our unit had lots of space and my 2 kids each got their own bed to sleep in. Last year we stayed at the Lake Buena Vista Resort Village and Spa. That resort is ranked much higher than this one and the price relects that. In all honesty, Oak Plantation was pretty close to Lake Buena Vista. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the price!”
Reviews.Author: Oompah100
Reviews.Content: After looking at all the reviews here on Trip Advisor and several other sites, I was hesitant on booking here. After realizing there were not many more choices due to the quick decision on taking a trip to Disney, I booked here. When I arrived it was friendly , but as others had stated in their reviews, They will not check you in until 4pm. We arrived at 130pm and had all the paperwork completed, but the key was not available till 4pm. So we decided to take a trip to Downtown Disney and get a bite to eat. When we arrived back at 530pm, the key was waiting for us. We were in Building 5 and upon entering, right away I looked for any of the conditions that were stated in several reviews. I did not find any bugs and the place was pretty well cleaned. Yes it could have been cleaned a little better, but it was in pretty good condition. Yes the place does need to update the furniture, but that did not bother me since everything was still in good condition. The room looked freshly painted. I did rent the 2 bedroom Villa with Housekeeping service, which I recieved the first 2 days we were there, but the last 3 days we had no housekeeping at all. We found a bag of towels at our door on the 3rd day and it lasted us the rest of the week so I did not complain about it. We found that the Washer and Dryer worked well. We did purchase a sheet at Target for the bed, since the one that they had on the bed did not fit well, Only cost $10, so it was no big deal and I would rather have my own sheet then one that has been well used. Air conditioning worked well and only bugs that I really saw maybe 3 times, were a waterbug . Which of course you will find anywhere in a hot weather climate. I found the place enjoyable and would have liked to take part in some of the activities they offered, but with our limited time schedule there and a 4 day pass to disney, it made it quite impossible. I would recommend this resort with no problem. The cost was relatively low and I found it very satisfying. You cannot always go by negative reviews, since some people may have grudges for one reason or another.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: patspy44
Reviews.Content: I was there to spend a couple of relaxing days with my son. It was the most horrible experience I ever had. The first night I arrived I was disappointed in the rooms and the smell. The second thing was the out dated and horrible furniture in every room. The following morning I awoke to find roaches in the bathroom and kitchen. The carpet was ripped and the sheet was dirty. I Contacted the location manager and she was pleasant. She then provided me with three other options for a room. Two of the smelled like it had not been cleaned for days. The smell of the carpet and the furniture was horrible. The third option was also horrible, I went to the nearby Walmart and purchase some fabreeze. Which could not mask the horrible odor in the room. Not to mention I found more roached in that room. To make matters worst. The was a leak from the second floor. I was not offered to be moved by the second manager that was on duty. She advised me that she would contact me because I was leaving for a few hours, I returned to the location and was advised she was on the grounds and was due to leave at five. Ten minutes to five I went back to the office only to find her on her way out. The only thing she had to offer after I asked to compensated for my troubles was that she would have the general manager contact me the next morning. I left the resort very unhappy about the way I was treated. I waited all day for a return call. Which I never received. I also contacted there corporate office which was also a waste of time.

Reviews.Title: “This resort is the best place to stay in Kissimee.”
Reviews.Author: wcnesta
Reviews.Content: Had a wonderful 4 weeks at this resort. Have stayed here for the last 7 years and have always had a wonderful time. Great place for the entire family. Most of the rooms are being remodeled and are nice and clean. The two pools and the hot tub are really nice and well maintained. The housekeeping service is really nice and the entire staff is very friendly and helpfull. We will continue to come here to get away from the winter weather. Thanks Max for a wonderful stay. Bill & Betty N

Reviews.Title: “This place is gross, rude, and bug infested.”
Reviews.Author: amandadavis05
Reviews.Content: The front desk lady was very rude. The outside and the inside of the hotel was very nice and was hoping for a good weekend get away from home, turns out we needed a get away from this hotel. When we got into our room less than two hours after getting settled in me and my friends ended up killing 13 cockroaches. asked to change room but rude lady stated that there was nothing aval. asked about a refund and she went to get her manager which placed us in a different room that was not bug infested just stain infested sheets and what looked to have been a previous case of bed bugs. the shower didnt stay hot or even warm for more than 3 min. We had cable in every room but the reception was horrible. i will never return to this hotel or recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “A little oasis to retreat to after the hustle and bustle of the area”
Reviews.Author: ja219
Reviews.Content: Gorgeous setting with an abundance of wildlife on your doorstep,in particular the peacocks roaming freely around the complex.Peaceful and safe .We felt very at ease and relaxed after busy days at theTheme Parks. Staff were friendly and the accomodation was very clean and supplied with everything we needed .We will definitely use again when we return to the area.

Reviews.Title: “DON'T STAY AT OAK PLANTATION.”
Reviews.Author: ODU673
Reviews.Content: This place is filthy. The carpets weren't vacuumed when we arrived. We called front desk and they said someone would be right over. It took a visit to the front desk to get action, hours later. Cockroaches, spider webs, dead bugs along walls, huge stains on carpets, security lock missing on door, sheets put on bed crosswise, dripping faucets, slow bathtub drain & the refrigerator was leaking inside. Maintenance usually did not respond to calls. After we found the cockroaches, we asked to be switched to another unit. This unit was just slightly better than the first. The furniture and bed were very uncomfortable. The grounds were very nice with a heated pool, tiki bar, wi-fi, but you don't live on the grounds. We left a day early and should have left as soon as we checked in. I will never go there again.

Reviews.Title: “The comfort of home, while away on business”
Reviews.Author: mstrwrks
Reviews.Content: Our trip was short and primarily for business, however we did manage to enjoy the pool and tiki bar when we were not busy. We needed an impromptu meeting room that the staff was more than ready to help us set up. At the end of the day the rooms made us feel like we were at home. When your away all the time it's a nice reminder. We'll be back to close our deal soon and look forward to spending our time here again. There was plenty of room and I may bring the family next time. It was definitely a nice change from the stale rooms at a normal hotel. We'll be sending more of our clients your way!! Thanks

Reviews.Title: “This place is dirty!”
Reviews.Author: joannarobinson
Reviews.Content: My family waited a long time for our Disney vacation. On a recommendation from our travel agent we stayed here. The first unit was so gross we asked to be moved. The second unit seemed a slight bit better. At least the furniture wasn't shredded. The carpets were dirty, the furniture was dirty and old. The bathroom was visibly dirty. I slept with my sweatshirt wrapped around my pillow. I would't take my shoes off to walk around. My family finally ended up leaving after three nights. The bathroom had ants and bugs...the last straw was the cockroach. We moved into a hotel where we were much happier. We asked for and received a full refund. Do NOT stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Skip It”
Reviews.Author: billbert61
Reviews.Content: Well, we just returned from Oak Plantation in Florida. This place really needs work. We stayed in a 2 bedroom. They put us on the bottom floor, with a family with 5 kids above us, and they ran around and jumped off the beds until after 11:30 everynight. The dishwasher was rusty in and out, the refrigerator was rusty, the safe was broken and the vent fan in the bathroom was dangling by it's wires. The dryer was broken, they tried to fix it 4 times, then while we were out they replaced it, that one didn't dry either, I told them the vents were clogged, as they both kept overheating and stopping, they never cleaned them. I was told the bathroom vent hung, because they didn't have the right sized one. They said they couldn't replace the battery in the safe, because the company was out of business, and they couldn't get the reset tool fixed. The pool had patches of algae on the sides. Oh yes, the rug was so dirty, your feet turned black instantly and you could smell the dirt as you walked, they don't shampoo them, just run a vacuum over them after people leave. They desk personnel were very friendly and helpful and the maintenance people tried, but they can't fix what they can't get parts for. But, they did manage to fund they remodeling of the exercise room. There is a small airport across the street, and the planes take off and land right over the buildings (low). Also, skip their breakfast. It's $6.95 per person for cold cereal, powdered eggs (too much mix, not enough water), breakfast sausage, make your own waffles, cold coffee, juice and small muffins. I suggest skipping this place until they get it remodeled, or at least cleaned. They have room service, if you pay for it. They have free poolside internet, not the fastest, but works most of the time. They only supply 4 place settings, and only a couple of pans to use, you need to go to Walmart to get paper plates and plastic utensils, if you plan to use the kitchen.

Reviews.Title: “This place is a DISASTER.”
Reviews.Author: designlmb
Reviews.Content: The photos on the website are BEAUTIFUL! My positive comments end there. This place is the worst place I have ever stayed at, and I shudder to think that I somehow managed to make it through two nights there before checking out. I should have left right away. I tried to make the best of it, ( I had booked a full week,) but things just kept getting worse. My unit was extremely dirty. It just felt grimy and I felt itchy. At first, I saw a few bugs near the sink, then thought, "that's gross, but it is Florida," and tried to let it go. In the morning, I toasted a pop tart, set it on a plate, walked away for two minutes, and when I came back there were bugs SWARMING all over it. This really grossed me out. I kept finding more and more bugs, crawling all over the bathroom counter and all of my bathroom stuff as well. When I found bugs crawling all over my suitcase, that was when I said "I need to get out of this place," and checked out immediately. There are stray cats everywhere roaming the facility. When you see how many cats and raccoons are running around the facility, you start to wonder what else this place is infested with. The bed was extremely uncomfortable, the sheets were cheap and scratchy and didn't fit the bed. There were no wash cloths, and the towels were thin, scratchy and stained. There was a champagne cork in the middle of the floor of the room when I first entered, there were stains and body hair on the tile floor. After a while, I didn't just tried not to look at anything. The phone did not work, and the tv was an old 18 inch tube tv from the mid 90s with fuzzy reception. The construction is cheap, everything looked like it was about to fall apart. The carpets were extremely dirty, and I saw the maintenance ladies with BROOMS (not vacuums) sweeping the carpets. They didn't even have dust pans... just brooms! Could somebody please explain to me how taking a broom to an area carpet does ANYTHING? When I told the staff at the front desk that I wanted to check out and that there were bugs in my unit and it was extremely dirty, they did not seem surprised or even concerned. I got the feeling that they were used to this happening all the time. This place is a complete DISASTER. It gave me the creeps from the moment I drove on the grounds, which are not well maintained. DO NOT STAY here unless you feel comfortable in a slum ghetto with bugs, cats, raccoons, body hair and WHO knows what else.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Property with friendly service”
Reviews.Author: FAD173
Reviews.Content: We ran a Reunion and booked 35 rooms at this Resort. The overwhelming majority of the the seventy people that attended had nothing but nice things to say about the Resort. Two large heated pools, Jacuzzi, children's water park, tiki bar, meeting room and beautiful Oak trees. Everyone from Consuela, the Group Manager to the folks who clean the rooms were very accommodating. Yes, there were a few glitches, but were quickly taken care of by the management. We are so happy with the Resort, we have already blocked off 40 rooms for 2012

Reviews.Title: “was a disgusting stay”
Reviews.Author: rayboom
Reviews.Content: we got in jan 15 the put us in room 211 u have to check this room out to believe what im going to tell u. they no toilet paper, no wash cloths, no dish cloths no knives, no over pan to cook in the oven, the refrig was rusty, stoves was rusty, wires hanging out of the oven door. the smoke alarm was hanging from the wall, staples coming from the rug, they want to rent movies but no dvd player in the room, no one wears a name tag so even if they treat u well u dont know there name. we had to go buy a pan for the oven so we could bake in oven, cant put anything in the safe they provide cause wires hanging out of the safe,bedroom door was patched and this a resort, ive stayed in hotels better than this.

Reviews.Title: “Every year, the blight gets worse.”
Reviews.Author: inglz
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at Oak Plantation on 5 different occasions over the past 7 years. The first time, everything was wonderful--in fact it was my nostalgia for the fun we had on our first visit that kept me coming back. With this last (and final) visit, the love affair is finally over. Things we liked? It is a perfect facility for a family vacation--and close to anything that the area has to offer. It has a wonderful pool area, the basketball and tennis courts. Those facilities are still in nice shape, but the rest of the place has gone to hell. The fitnes center is shut down. The rooms are old and worn. The bed coverings are threadbare and of "camp quality". The kitchen is missing many things that might make it more usable. Our first morning, we left for the day--only to find out they had taken our towels, bath matt, washclothes, etc., and left nothing. We had to call the front desk. They said they would send someone over--but it took a second call and we got them the next morning. There were no sheets for the pull-out couch. I called about that and it also took too long. The comforter and blanket on the master bed had cigarette burn holes. There were ants in the kitchen. The landscaping is unkempt, even though golf carts buzz around the place all day (and night). There is wireless internet--but only around the pool area and at the internet cafe--both have limited hours. It really is a shame. For a couple thousand dollars a unit (or less) everything could be brought back to the acceptable range. This used to be a very nice place--and we loved staying here. Unfortunately, the property managers have decided to wring as much out of it as they possibly can--without putting anything back. We're done waiting for the makeover. There are too many nice places in the Orlando Kissimmee area who keep their places up to date. Sorry guys...I held on for as long as I could.

Reviews.Title: “no more stay at this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: ABMAUTOCENTER
Reviews.Content: This is the 3th year, i stay at this hotel, but NO MORE, first I could not use the bath room there was a water leak from a room upstair. So they had to move me 4th times,hot tub was not working during the time i stayed, no bath towels in the room, the heater was not working when temp -3 at night. The door`s key was not working properly and in the end I lost my Video camera!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Don't even touch it!”
Reviews.Author: preb67
Reviews.Content: Don't trust the website or any review that says anything above three stars. It is in a horrible dangerous area and the resort looks beat lime it hasn't been touched in years. I'm a college frat member who has stayed in some down places and this grossed me out.

Reviews.Title: “Do you really want to know the truth?”
Reviews.Author: Figment2010
Reviews.Content: So, here it is, our overview of our stay at the Oak Plantation Resort, and our 8th visit to Orlando. Initially, like many others, we were concerned about the negative reviews given by a few people on this site, so we called the resort ahead of our stay and questioned a lady called Asha about these reviews. She assured us that changes had been made, and that things were improving. On arrival at the site, we saw, what can only be described as a very pretty resort complex, well lit, very clean, well designed and very tranquil, all coupled with lots of well kept natural vegetation and tree's. The reception was excellent, and luckily on arrival, around 8.00pm, we met Asha. We introduced ourselves and we were greeted in the usual Floridian manner, all smiles and very polite. We requested somewhere quiet, away from the pool as we don't have any children and wanted to relax. We were kindly given apartment 1212, which was located on the upper level. On first inspection the rooms were clean, tidy, and well fitted out with the usual equipment that is found in every other villa and apartment. The only downside was a slight bit of dirt beside the cooker, and some staining on the grout in the bathrooms. But when you consider the amount of use these resorts get, coupled with what must be some very difficult and sometimes dirty people, who use these facilities for a few weeks, and then to turn them around for the next set of customers, must be very difficult. So bearing that in mind, we went to Wal-Mart and bought some kitchen cleaner with bleach for 0.98 cents which solved the problem. By the way, Wal-Mart is approximately half a mile to the west, marker 15. Fab place to shop, again and again and again. Breakfast ! Our breakfast was included in our package price which consisted of, fresh scrambled eggs, freshly cooked hot sausages, hot potatoes, hot porridge, hot fresh waffles, (yummy) fresh cinnamon swirls, cereals, cold milk, tea, coffee, fresh bread, bread rolls, and various yoghurts. All very nice and great to set yourself up before going to the parks, especially as you can eat as much as you want. Overview. Is Oak Plantation worth the money? We paid £693.00 each, so a grand total of £1386.00. This included direct BA flights to Orlando MCO from LGW, 2 weeks at the Oak Plantation including breakfast. This is a no brainer ! ! ! We have stayed at Mystic Dunes, Summer Bay, Sheraton Vistana, Lindfield Villas, Southern Dunes several times, and you are right, this is not the same as these resorts, but we didn't pay anywhere near the same amount of money as these top resorts. Would we stay again? Damned right. Lovely people, great service, great shopping mall right across the road which has Beales, Ross, and Burrington Coat Factory, a pound shop and Cici's pizza. Just for reference, Cici's offer all you can eat buffet for $5.99, or a 15" pizza for $4.99. Also be aware that this is not a HoJo's or Comfort inn, these are fully equipped apartments, and once again, we have come home with no dirty washing as there are laundry facilities in each apartment. Like most people in this world, if you treat the staff with respect, and treat them as you would like to be treated yourself; you will be amazed at how far a smile can go. In conclusion, we shall be back. Thanks Asha and staff for a lovely stay, and hope to see you soon. John & Sally-Anne

Reviews.Title: “I'd check your room and don' t settle for less”
Reviews.Author: AthensKen
Reviews.Content: We've owned for 10 years-how can you tell buyers with a straight face that the rooms will be updated every 5 years-we're still waiting.Our room we were to stay in had problems and was dirty.The good thing was you moved us to a bigger one (funny we tried to update to a bigger unit before and you didn't have one.)

Reviews.Title: “Some money spent on the units would be beneficial but we still like the place.”
Reviews.Author: DaveTraceandsprogs
Reviews.Content: We have owned @ Oak Plant since 1999 and have visited with our 3 daughters for the last 4 years. The units need some upgrading, same tv's and decor as when we bought our timeshare in 1999. The activities for children have gradually deteriorated over the last few years and the last 2 years our children have been the only ones in fancy dress for Halloween. With the best theme parks in the world nearby we are not too concerned. The location for the parks is great (courtesy shuttle), the pool area and grounds are excellent and I enjoy my soccer chats with Gene behind the Tiki Bar. Staff are always friendly and when we were infested by ants this year we were moved straight away to a new unit. Pest control needs attention. Lot of bites this year which was frustating. Restaurants aplenty nearby although more and more boarded up each year. The Loop nearby has a great cinema and plenty of shops. 2 weeks passes too quickly each year. Try flying to and fromTampa via Philidelphia. We did this year and it was a breeze compared to Orlando airport which is a nightmare. Back again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Resort For Your Money!”
Reviews.Author: WayneHFX
Reviews.Content: Check in was amazing, staff were great and when we got to our room, we wern't expecting it to be great due to the negative responses but were pleasantly surprised. The room was clean, smelled clean and whenever we needed anything such as new towels or extra bedding, a quick call to the front desk and they were at our door within minutes. The pool area was clean and the grounds were nice. Just don't expect a 5 star accomodation and the newest decor. Rooms are a bit outdated but unless you're an interior decorator then you are fine. Comfortable beds, clean room in a nice quiet area is what we were looking for and we found it at Oak Plantation Resort.

Reviews.Title: “gone downhill”
Reviews.Author: traceyoz
Reviews.Content: My husband and i have just returned from a 3 week stay at the oak plantation villas this was our fifth year and to be honest the place has really gone down hill.the grounds and pool are lovely so are the staff but the villas are in extreme need of a good clean our villa was very dirty . I had to clean the cooker and fridge before using them as they were both dirty we asked for clean sheets and towels on 2 separate occasions and none were brought we endeed up washing the sheets our self we even found a used condom down the side of the bedside table disgusting how the cleaner missed this i dont know as it was in plain view. Im sorry to say we wont be returning there next year sad because we really did like the place.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: CDGoldRush
Reviews.Content: We are just back fom Oak Plantation and loved it. We stayed in a 2 bed apt. The main bedroom had a king side bed. The other room had 2 double beds. There was also a living room and kitchen. All as they looked in the website. We were concerned after some of the recent reviews and brought towels and toliet paper with us us but this was totally unneccesary. The pool was gorgeous and warm. Beside the pool was a Tiki Bar. Gene is the main barman and an absolute legend. They have a bus running to the parks at various times. If the time doesn't suit you for Disney there's the 56 bus that runs from outside the hotel and vice-versa until 22.45 at night. I would definitely return to the Oak Plantation Resort and have advised people to do since we returned.

Reviews.Title: “Run down, dirty and not worth your money”
Reviews.Author: harleyabbydog
Reviews.Content: We were very disappointed with this resort. It looked great on the internet but in person we found that it was run down and in need of repairs. The size of the condo was good and the grounds were fine. It was dirty, so we asked to be moved to another unit. That unit was also dirty (body hair in tub and on bathroom and kitchen floor), so we bought cleaning supplies and cleaned it ourselves. The dishwasher was no longer attached to the wall inside the cabinetry so it would pull out into the middle of the kitchen floor every time you tried to open it. The rack inside of it was rusted through. The bathroom sink had a hole in it and was rusty. The toaster didn't work. The dryer needed 3 cycles to get a load of clothing dried. There was hardly any cookware in the unit. Sugar ants plagued us in the bathroom and kitchen the whole week. And the most aggravating thing.....cheap uncomfortable mattresses and fitted sheets that were too small, popping off the corners of the mattress as soon as you got on the bed! The bedspreads were very faded and worn. Many many issues, and yet the staff at the resort were unconcerned and never once apologized. I would be VERY angry if I was an owner of one of these condos paid $700 or more in maintenance fees. Where is the money going - because it doesn't look like it is being used at this resort! Keep searching for a condo..don't waste your money on this one!

Reviews.Title: “A Perfect Fit”
Reviews.Author: cog94
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were a bit apprehensive to stay here based upon some of the other reviews. It was perfect. It wasn't too far from Disney but not too close, so we didn't have to deal too much with the traffic. We had the 2-story one-bedroom suite with a sleeper sofa on the first floor and really enjoyed our space. My mother and son slept on the sleeper very comfortably, while my husband, our 4-month old and myself slept in the King suite. The fact that we had a full kitchen, full-size washer and dryer and ample storage space was a plus. We've decided that we will certainly stay there on our next visit to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “If you like bugs, dirt and outdated appliances then go for it!”
Reviews.Author: AZtractorman
Reviews.Content: I am not a picky guy but this place went beyond even my tolerance threshold. I checked the ratings and thought it really can't be as bad as some people say but boy was I wrong. I called to verify my reservation and was told everything was in order. When we arrived there was some confusion and they had to scramble to get us a 2 bedroom even through the place seemed nearly deserted. They should have been embarrassed to send us to our first room. The carpet was filthy and had waves in it which you could trip over. We thought we could deal with the carpet issue but then we saw the ants crawling all over the kitchen counter. At that point we did not inspect the facilities any further and I went back to the lobby to get reassigned a new room. We moved our stuff to the new place and found it tollerable initially although it had several issues after further inspection such as rusted appliances, non working dryer, stained carpet, more ants, unmade beds. Our plan was to prepare some meals there but we skipped that idea because there were very few cooking utensils supplied as promised by their description not to mention the ants and filthy conditions. It is hard to believe they actually charge money for this a facility in this kind of condition but it is evident the owners do not re-invest any money in personell or property maintenance. I would never recommend this property to my worst enemy and we will never stay here again. There are too many other beautiful properties which are priced similarly. In short, this "resort" is dirty, outdated and bug infested.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel/apartment, service could be better.”
Reviews.Author: Knaapje
Reviews.Content: Stayed 10 days in the smallest apartment they have.But for one/two people big enough. Nice, clean upstairs ap. Complete kitchen, old tv. Nice park, quiet, almost no sound from small airport in the neighborhood. Most 1 or 2 engine airplanes. Sometimes a business jet. Nice pool. A lot of restaurants in the neighborhood. Everything is a little older and some things need a little maintenance and upgrading, but for 2 1/2 stars it is okay. Especially for the price I paid for a combined booking including flight and car via Expedia. Breakfast $6 is worth its price. Only scrumbled eggs and sausages, make your own waffels, cereals, canned fruit and the standard stuff, a 4 out of 5. But the park was about 25-30% occupied, may be it had to do with that. Only few people for breakfast, everybody had his own kitchen also. Internet in the cafe, not in the room, but as you see how large the lot is you can image it costs a lot to realise internet in each room. You could Wifi 24 hours a day on the terrace and by the pool via your own notebook. As you need a PC the internetcafe was open limited hours. Service could be upgraded. Toner from the printers in the cafe was empty for days. They said they ordered new cartridges. Hello... within a mile there were plenty shops that sell HP cartridges . Had to let my boardingpasses printed by the receptiondesk. Got prints with heavy black stripes on it, so at the airport thay were not readable. On arrival the telephone in the room did not work and they could not have it back online during my 10 day stay. Must admit they offered another room, but as I liked the room I made my calls via the phone in the mainbuilding. Of course Gsm was also possible, but for intercontinental calls a little expensive. All in all I think it is worth a second visit.

Reviews.Title: “WORST STAY EVER!”
Reviews.Author: debideb
Reviews.Content: As an author, I travel from state to state, this time I brought my family and regret it! After being switched from four rooms and my daughter attacked by fire red ants, we DO NOT recommend this hotel to anyone. I requested a full refund and am awaiting their response. Stay away...this should be listed as a 1 star! Not clean at all and our property was stolen by housekeeping!

Reviews.Title: “Major disappointment”
Reviews.Author: yarisowner
Reviews.Content: We booked from an agent in Nova Scotia. We stayed 3 hours before requesting another, cleaner venue. The rooms smelled of must, A/C was inadequate, turned off in one room. Anthills outside the doors, filthy rooms, toilets, & carpets...a dump!

Reviews.Title: “Not again!!!”
Reviews.Author: niceone77
Reviews.Content: Check in was fast and effecient. Not happy with first room though. We got into our room (704) and first thing off the bat I saw ants all over the kitchen wall. We called the front desk as soon as we saw them, three hours later they had still not sent anyone to do anything about them ants. When we came back in and discovered they had not done anything we called back to the front desk and requested another room, we had found more ants on the livingroom wall and crawling on the couch. They did move us to another room (502) which was much nicer and no signs of ants. The fitness center was worthless (one treadmill plug broken), gizzel (broken footing) an OLD bike the only thing that did work and a weight bench. Safes in either rooms did not work, and breakfast not worth the money even though it was cheap. Supplies - they do not provide laundry det. liquid dish soap and no extra toliet paper to start with. The pool was really nice on the evening we went after long days at the parks. Overall the room was comfortable and services was good but not excellant. Would I go back or recommend it to anyone NO. ****Larry the shuttle driver was the oly stand out, he was very knowledgable about the area and the weather. He was great!!!!

Reviews.Title: “I am a timeshare holder of this property- What happened to this nice place?”
Reviews.Author: TerriTyler37
Reviews.Content: When I bought this timeshare it was nice and clean. Had refreshments in the lobby and computer room. Now the lobby's windows and mirrors are filthy. Where is my 800 for a week going? My room number is annually 615 week 30. Let me tell you this place has been run down in the last 2 years and if I was the owner the first thing I would do is fire housekeeping. Get a new Supervisor over Housekeeping and your business will improve. During our stay there was no pool towels, the activity person tried her best but we were told we had to make appts. to do activities. When we never had to do that. The main thing there was no toilet paper in the rooms neither towels. Yes, there were dead bugs in our sheets. But, there were dead lizards the 1st time I came. Our air conditioner was broken for 2 days with water draining on the carpet. If I was the Manager of this place first fire House keeping. 2nd get the activities department fun like it use to be. Get the Casino boat back and then you won't hear all these complaints. I have to pay 800 for a week in December. How much money is that if everybody pays? Million? Also the kiddy pool needs repairs. You will have the money. Do it...

Reviews.Title: “They need to clean.”
Reviews.Author: JackieKopplin
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at Oak Plantation Resort from Sept. 22-Sept. 27. We didn't end up arriving until 2 a.m. from the airport due to being lost. We had bad directions. We arrived and ended up getting a 2 bedroom that had about 20 steps leading up. This was a surprise. We got up the stairs with all our luggage only to find that the place smelled, there were no towels, no toilet paper, the stove didn't even open, and it was dirty. I clean houses for a living and this really upset me. I know how to clean and these people need a lesson in cleaning. We called and complained and we were transferred to a villa near the pond and the pool. This one was much cleaner and you could tell it had been cleaned before we came. We were told that Dominos delivered until 4am. Not true. We had been lost, bad villa, and then we couldn't eat. Now we had to go find food when we have no idea what is available. Needless to say our trip started out badly. I was kind of expecting some kind of compensation because of all the garbage and the fact that we were still charged for Wednesday night when we didn't arrive until 2 a.m. Thursday kind of bothered me. I know that we allready paid but with all the stuff we went through at this time of the morning I felt that we could have been given some kind of discount. The rest of our trip was very decent. We had housekeeping every day except when my brother didn't want them to come in. We had a great time at the pool and the sundaes were a nice compliment in the hot weather. I would have liked them to have sprayed the pool area for fire ants though, they were biting me a lot on Thursday. We did go to the Magic Kingdom and Seaworld. It was nice that this resort was within minutes from them. We did not take the shuttle there at all because I felt we shouldn't have to pay to go there when other places bring you complimentary. I was upset that the internet was not wireless. I am a college student that needed to do my homework when I was on vacation. I could not concentrate in the pool area and the internet cafe was only open from 1-9 and I didn't understand why. Why wouldn't this just be open all the time? Since we were so close to the pool, I decided that I would try to get the internet and to my surprise it worked!!! I could do my homework in the villa. I wish I would have found this out sooner. I do think that the staff were very nice in the am shifts. The night shift people that we dealt with were not very courteous. I even asked to see the second villa before we moved into it and it seemed to irritate them. I wanted to see what the next one would look like. We did have a good time but the start of the stay was a mess. I would go back when they update. My mom talked to a member of the board while we were there and she gave him the whole story.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE COME COME COME COME!!”
Reviews.Author: FuFuRockzWithLove
Reviews.Content: There is only one thing that some people may be bothered with and it's that rooms are a bit outdated, however, it wasn't exactly a blast from the past either. I'm 19 and traveled with my mom and aunt and the 3 of us LOVED IT! The staff is amazing and when you drive in you feel like you're in your own little town :D. They had full kitchens, walk-in-closet and a sofa bed in the living room. It's like having a quaint 1 bedroom apartment with a washer and dryer IN MY UNIT WOOHOO. No matter where we would have stayed we would have had an awesome view. They have a lake in the center that attract all sorts of birds... I actually just recently saw 4 peacocks chillen right outside the internet cafe I'm in right now HA HA (which by the way has a complimentary soda bar)! The pools were clean, the jacuzzi is sheltered and I would have loved to bring my nephews for the kiddie pool. The pool area also has a tiki bar that I've heard was really good but didn't have a chance to check out myself. They have a general store on site so we didn't even need to leave the resort when we ran out of basics. EVERYTHING within the resort IS WALKING DISTANCE! :D They also have a tennis court I wish I had time to check out but I noticed that you can even check out the rackets and ball :o The STAFF is AMAZING!! You can tell they love their jobs AND customer service. Any issue we had was IMMEDIATELY resolved and with smiles! CAN'T WAIT TO GO BACK! p.s. if you check out myresortnetwork.com - click on timeshare - look for orlando and you'll find a special for their hotel. If you reserve before the hotel is finished upgrading they will allow you to stay at the resort for no additional cost! :D ENJOY

Reviews.Title: “It was beautiful! Staff was super! Can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: DebG1960
Reviews.Content: It was a beautiful place to stay. We had all the amenities we could think of. Staff was great!

Reviews.Title: “Average Place- Bring Toilet Paper”
Reviews.Author: AlbertaTraveladict
Reviews.Content: Well, this place is average, with a great price point. We arrived early, so they let us keep our bags there while we went to Epcot for the day, and they told us they would transfer our luggage when we returned. We didn't arrive back till late, and we were pleased when we saw our 2 bedroom condo. Nice, clean and roomy. Then we went into the washrooms. No Toilet paper, No towels, no luggage. So we called the front desk. They said they would send some right away. An hour later, nothing, so we called again. They said housekeeping said they brought it, but would send them again. Another hour, still nothing. Another phone call, more apologies, and a promise they would come right away. Another hour, we walk down to the main office. We said we still didn't have anything, including our luggage. She seemed surprised, so I said I don't see how you're surprised, all that luggage behind you is ours. They then got us towels and toilet paper to take back to our room ourselves, and the nice security guard helped with the luggage. A few minutes later, we heard a knock at the door. I laughed thinking it would be housekeeping finally. Well, it was another guest staying there, they saw us walking with the stuff and asked where to get it, they had arrived the day BEFORE us and still had no towels or toilet paper!!! After that, we didn't have any issues. Well, the Wifi wasn't working right at the pool, but that can happen anywhere. One piece of advice though, if you want their transfers to Disney or Universal, book early. They only have 1 van, and can only take 14 passengers, and cabs are pricey. One way from Universal was $40. So all that being said, I wouldn't recommend this based on the service, but if you want a decent cheap place that has a good pool, its not bad, just don't go with any expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Good Deal...just prepare to do some cleaning.”
Reviews.Author: alihia
Reviews.Content: The staff was all extremely friendly!!! Th amentities were great...pools and hot tub and tiki bar were great. Movie night was good at the pool. The wifi signal could be picked up close to the internet cafe but not in the rooms. Wasnt too inconvenient for us because our villa was close to the cafe. Room was not clean at all. It was picked up and in order but not clean. The toilet was nasty and the floors all needed to be swept. The couch had stains on it so it looked dirty. I went to the store to do some grocery shopping and picked up a couple of cleaning products. Cleaned bathroom and tile floors and all countertops and tables...requested a vaccuum and I got one right away. Vaccuumed and sprayed floors and sofa and chair etc. with lysol and febreeze. Other than the crappy cleaning job by the cleaning staff...I would say it is worth the money. Good Deal....not the cheapest and not the most expensive. Very convenient...only about 15 mins (including traffic) from parks and downtown disney...grocery store and gas station and restaurants within 2 mins. Again staff extremely friendly...Would recommend!!

Reviews.Title: “Total Dissapointment”
Reviews.Author: nickone9
Reviews.Content: We called the desk to alert them that we would be a late arrival, so they had plenty of time to make up the room. When we arrived at 11pm there were no towels no paper toiletries, toilet paper etc.. The rooms were dirty , there was hair and dust on the bathroom floors, mold on the bathroom tile. The sheets did not fit the beds and would constantly pull off the matresses. The Air conditioner did not work no cold air at all it didnt go below 82 degress. The ceiling fans squeaked loudly. By Far the worst place

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant holiday don't be put off.”
Reviews.Author: shuks123
Reviews.Content: Stayed here recently for 2 weeks. Holiday was brilliant. The apartment was dated but perfefectly acceptable. Very spacious, lots of storage and if anything extra was needed they were happy to supply ie, frying pan & baking tray. You do have to chase towels but once you have them hide them and wash them yourselves, thats what we ended up doing......as the housekeeping people kept taking all the towels even the unused ones !! The pool was great especially with teenagers as they could use free wifi and facebook to their hearts content. All in all we had a good holiday, but just be openminded and don't expect 5 star after all it is a cheaper holiday.

Reviews.Title: “NOT HAPPY”
Reviews.Author: jajburg
Reviews.Content: First of all, let me say that the front desk clerks are working as hard as they can. But, on the flip side BEWARE. Upon entering our room, the ceiling fans were covered in dust and I was told to clean it myself until I insisted that someone be sent to our condo. The oven was dirty, the glasses in the cabinet were dirty. Apparently, they had a towel "situtation" so they were low or non existent. The phone in the room worked sporadically. EVERYONE I spoke to at the pool area - and there were MANY guests told me the same thing - THEY WERE NOT HAPPY!! Could not even get information from the front desk for pizza, taxi, etc., they were not prepared.

Reviews.Title: “If you like bathing in mold this is the place to stay”
Reviews.Author: pokermom1722
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend that you do not stay at this hotel. House keeping is horrible. Not to mention that there is BLACK MOLD literally growing everyone. Could not get towels and they cancelled our shuttle without notifying us. Had the children with us and could not even get sheets and blankets to make up the pull out bed for the kids. This is supposed to be a 4 star hotel but quite honestly I would not even give is 1. The place was also crawling with bugs. Dont expect to be able to shop at the General Store on the property as it will never be open. Same goes for the laundry room as it was OUT OF ORDER during our entire stay

Reviews.Title: “The service stinks”
Reviews.Author: mils025
Reviews.Content: I traveled to this place with my cousin and her 14 yr old son. We paid for room service we never got . We had to purchase towels and toilet paper , because by the time they brought it we did not need it. The next day the air conditioner was not working properly, we reported it in the morning , they came at 10:30 pm to check it, we were already sleeping. Their services really need some work , and they aren't the cleanest people either. When they finally came they did a terrible job we had to redo it. We tried to remove the service, and they claimed we had to go through Expedia to do so. The place looks good on the inside the rooms are decent but the services stink.

Reviews.Title: “cannot possibly be 4 star wouldnt even give it one!!”
Reviews.Author: teresatolfrey
Reviews.Content: on arrival staff not very friendly and after booking a year in advance and an 8 hour flight and arriving at approx 7pm that evening rooms not ready and because we had requested two apartments near to each other we had to wait another hour. the appts were in same block but had no clean bedding or towels. there was dirty towels and linen piled up in the bath. The dishwasher was full of dirty dishes. The safe locked all our belongings in it and we had to wait for the maintenance man to come out and literally smash the front off because the safe company the used had gone bust. The brochure showed a lovely pool with water polo net, in fact the tiles were all smashed and jagged around the pool and the net was a bit of string! There was bins overflowing everywhere. The buffet breakfast was a joke it didnt even have milk for cereals or tea even though their convenience store was opposite., which again was a joke, it was practically empty. Web site said it was showing the World Cup Football on large screen, never even saw a large screen and staff knew nothing about it and said if it was going to be shown it would be in the pool bar which had two small tvs, when we said we would be down to watch the start of the England match at 10am they laughed and said they didnt open until 11am. What a joke, Virgin must remove this from their brochure. P.S. the staff also like to sleep on the sofas in the reception!

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE”
Reviews.Author: dowjayson
Reviews.Content: We were vacationig here for 1 week. 7/15-7/22 This resort is so CRAPPY. My first night there My girlfriend and I were awaken (2am) by a COCKROACH crawling under the sheets with us. Then when we called the front desk they LAUGHED and told us to call back after 7am. The next day they gave us a new Villa but the desk clerk was rude and ask us why did we need to move????? Hello LIVE ROACHES in my bed WTF... Need I say more! The customer service from the desk clerks was HORRIBLE. The next Villa was NO BETTER there was hair in the bed, hair all over the lamp shade and table and no linen in the bathroom. This was the worse Hotel stay ever. I DO NOT reccoment this resort to anyone!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “believe what you read here as well as others”
Reviews.Author: KeithP70
Reviews.Content: don't waste your money coming here. just got back after a week at disney. their service is the worst I have ever encountered in the last 15 years of taking my kids on vacations. If you don't believe me, check out other remarks on another travel site. For three people, they gave us 2 towels, It took 6 calls in 1 day to get more. Never mind trying to get extra cot and toilet paper. The rooms had bugs in them. both my daughter and I have numerous bug bites on our bodies. The only reason I went there is it I traded my timeshare week in VT to through interval intl and this as the only place that offered a kitchen on the week I was going.

Reviews.Title: “Awful”
Reviews.Author: Vhazel
Reviews.Content: The place was rundown. It seems as if they 'tried' to clean but wasn't successful. We were afraid to sleep on the sheets until we sprayed with Lysol. Also, there were 4 of us, and when we checked in, we only had one set of towels in the bathroom. We had to wait until the next morning, and they had washed some, before we received enough for our room. Even though trash was picked up everyday in the canisters, the canisters weren't big enough to hold all the trash per unit and sometimes there was trashbags put on the ground by the canister. The staff took forever to answer the phone. After we checked out, my deposit was never released to my account.and I am still trying to contact someone at the property to release my funds.

Reviews.Title: “AWFUL NIGHTMARE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: LadyNurse
Reviews.Content: This resort was a dump. Our assigned unit had MILDEW growing practically EVERYWHERE. It smelled awful! I took a picture of a huge hairball that was left on the sofa. The carpet was un-vaccumed. The grounds were unsightly, landscaping was unkempt & trash barrels were all over the place. We were totally unsatisfied with this resort. The refrigerator had a large area of rust @ the bottom. We stayed only 1 night and was running on top of one another to get out. Oak Plantation's website looks nice enough but it is extremely deceiving!!!!! I am not sure why RCI would recommend this resort to anyone- It’s plain substandard. We complained to RCI & they moved us the next morning to The Villages at Parkway Resort -- the difference was night & day! I would not recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Ron_Gray
Reviews.Content: We will return for another holiday. The service was good except room service needs improving. They did not always leave new towels after taking used ones away. The free breakfasts (Virgin holidays bonus) were okay but no changes from day to day. The location was excellent with stunning surroundings and wildlife. We had a two bedroom unit on second floor (room 510). Close enough to facilities but not too close to the pool to be disturbed by late night swimmers.
